alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:23PM MST until December 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow may significantly reduce visibility and create partial lane blockages on area roads, especially along highway 200 east of Great Falls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Weather Advisory in effect for today has been cancelled.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
